Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2008 02:46PM chelli wrote: I had a hysterectomy Aug 1 to aleviate severe anemia due to bleeding/fibroids.  Not able to take HRT, so my gyn prescribed Celexa to combat depression and Restoril for insomnia.  Everyone says I am a totally different person now.  I think I needed those all along.. way before the dx!  I have noticed that if I forget to take my meds in the morning, by evening I am extremely irritable, so I guess they are working.
Posts.Title: Anyone out there taking anti-anxiety meds? Wink PugMum
